attributes.action: accept as spurious the suggestion  that 3 million jobs and over half the UK's foreign trade are at risk if we changed our relationship with the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the recent response to Robert Dennell's petition on the need for a referendum on the new EU reform treaty it was suggested that membership of the EU had brought real benefits to the UK as 3 million jobs and over half our foreign trade is with the EU and that if we had a referendum this could be at risk. This is nonsense as the EU buy far more from us than we do from them and whatever the outcome of a referendum free trade between the EU and ourselves would continue as it is in the EU's interest to reach an amicable solution.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
